articles.description: Mesut Ozil continues to be a peripheral figure at Arsenal having been left out of the club's Premier League squad by Mikel Arteta but the German has posted defiantly on social media
articles.content:
Mesut Ozil has referenced his "struggles" in his latest Instagram post as he continues to be out in the cold at Arsenal. 
The German was recently omitted from the club's Premier League squad which w… [+1978 chars]

articles.author: Darren Wells
articles.title: Neymar 'prioritises' new five-year PSG deal as he gives up hopes of Barcelona return - Mirror Online
articles.description: The Brazilian's current contract is due to expire in 2022 but talks are already underway with PSG chiefs over an extension as Neymar looks to cement his legacy at the club
articles.content:
Neymar is reportedly prioritising signing a new five-year deal with Paris Saint-Germain after giving up hopes of a return to Barcelona. 
The Brazilian forward tried to push through a move back to th… [+2022 chars]
